description: A React component implementing a calendar grid with day cells, event display, and interaction handlers.

classes.name: DayCell
classes.description: Interface representing a day cell in the calendar grid, including date and whether it is in the current month.

classes.name: Props
classes.description: Interface defining the properties accepted by the CalendarGrid component, including year, month, weeks, events, and callback functions.

methods.name: eventsForDate
methods.description: Filters and sorts events for a specific date in ISO format.

methods.name: CalendarGrid
methods.description: React functional component rendering the calendar grid with days, events, and interaction handlers.
